#summary Description and passwords of DIRIGENT IDE VMware virtual machine.

= Introduction =

DIRIGENT IDE is VMware virtual machine configured to develop and test dirigent-demo project. It is based on Ubuntu linux and contains Eclipse IDE, Oracle XE demo database, Oracle Pentaho Data integration with instaled dirigennt add-in. The oracle database contains demo Enterprise Architect model and demo datamart schema. All datamart layers (L0, L2) are for simplicity in one schema which is not recomended for real world projects.
